content: BRILLIANT!Well done Thunder (or is it Ms Puff?) I loved the couple of post of yours that I’ve read (will follow, to be sure). AND I admire your cartooning, you really pull the essence out out of each part of the story that you illustrate and make it even (((((funnier) or sadder) or sillier) or more ironic)=Better!Keep up the good writering and drawering.
